traits.Nimble Escape: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.Multiattack: The goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.
actions.Scimitar: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
